extendedInfo.description: X-mas Tree DecoratorWhen Christmas comes around, we like to get the largest and best tree to decorate. The decorations are ultimately what makes a successful X-Mas Tree. And believe this app [x-mas Tree Decorator] can help you shaping your tree and decorate it in the best possible way, Are you ready to decorate yours X-Mas Tree-Significant Features:--- Decide theme like snow-flakes, angels, nut-crackers, toys.-- Apply lighting, ornaments, feathers, ribbons, garland, beads, chocolates, -- ornaments like glass balls, birds, toys, boating, Santa toys, gifts , bells etc.-- Share tree, Save tree for future useAnd don't forget to decorate the bottom of your tree.and the best thing of this app is it's free of cost and you can share with your friends, colleagues, family and create and design awesome trees for your X-mas .....You can Share via facebook, twitter, digg, gmail, email, instagram or any social networking appChristmas is both a sacred religious holiday and a worldwide cultural and commercial phenomenon. For two millennia, people around the world have been observing it with traditions and practices that are both religious and secular in nature. Christians celebrate Christmas Day as the anniversary of the birth of Jesus of Nazareth, a spiritual leader whose teachings form the basis of their religion. Popular customs include exchanging gifts, decorating Christmas trees, attending church, sharing meals with family and friends and, of course, waiting for Santa Claus to arrive. December 25âChristmas Dayâhas been a federal holiday in the United States since 1870.

reviews.title: It\'s ok app
reviews.comment: Just basic Christmas tree decorating, it\'d be better if an option for resizing ornaments and gifts
reviews.author: Channy Perkins
